response.overview: A tribute to the controversial black activist and leader of the struggle for black liberation. He hit bottom during his imprisonment in the '50s, he became a Black Muslim and then a leader in the Nation of Islam. His assassination in 1965 left a legacy of self-determination and racial pride.
response.tagline: Scholar, convict, leader, disciple, hipster, father, hustler, minister, black man, every man.
response.title: Malcolm X

cast.name: Simon Do-Ley
cast.character: Son of Elijah Muhammad and Secretary Evelyn Williams

results.name: Mark Kermode reviews Malcolm X (1992) | BFI Player
By Any Means Necessary: The Making of Malcolm X
